amendment.description: Amendment sought to zero out the economic development assistance programs and grants in the Economic Development Administration Account and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to zero out the economic development assistance programs and grants in the Economic Development Administration Account and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 279 (Roll no. 207).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 279 (Roll no. 207).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Pompeo.
